quotes.quote: After God perfected the sunrise, he created photographers, artists, and poets to ensure his feat remained immortal.
Give me odorous at sunrise a garden of beautiful flowers where I can walk undisturbed.
Next time a sunrise steals your breath or a meadow of flowers leave you speechless, remain that way. Say nothing, and listen as Heaven whispers, do you like it? I did it just for you.

When I think about that sunrise that I woke up to that morning, I just feel like I got as close to nowhere as I could get, and found out that it was more of a place than anywhere I've been in a long time.
God is now serving scoops of orange and raspberry sherbet on the horizon. What a beautiful sunrise!
We can only appreciate the miracle of a sunrise if we have waited in the darkness.

The grand show is eternal. It is always sunrise somewhere; the dew is never dried all at once; a shower is forever falling; vapor is ever rising. Eternal sunrise, eternal dawn and gloaming, on sea and continents and islands, each in its turn, as the round.
The sky is that beautiful old parchment in which the sun and the moon keep their diary.
As I watched the sun began its daily routine, casting golden hue and illuminating cities, I wondered, what an exemplary way to start my daily routine.
We need to be reminded sometimes that a sunrise last but a few minutes. But its beauty can burn in our hearts eternally.

Sunrise doesn't last all morning, a cloudburst doesn't last all day, seems my love is up and has left you with no warning. It's not always going to be this grey. All things must pass, all things must pass away.
Every day a million miracles begin at sunrise!
Sunrise paints the sky with pinks and the sunset with peaches. Cool to warm. So is the progression from childhood to old age.
Every sunset is also a sunrise. It all depends on where you stand.
It was harder to drown at sunrise than in darkness.
Get outside. Watch the sunrise. Watch the sunset. How does that make you feel? Does it make you feel big or tiny? Because there's something good about feeling both.
With their backs to the sunrise they worship the night.
Even if you cover the whole world with darkness, you can never stop the sun from rising.
One of the things I associate with God is a sunrise. How many sunrises have you missed over the years, and God created that.
At sunrise everything is luminous but not clear.
Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
Know where to find the sunrise and sunset times and note how the sky looks at those times, at least once.
To stand by the beds at sunrise and see the flowers awake is a heavenly delight.
There is no sunrise so beautiful that it is worth waking me up to see it.
I wouldn't be surprised if tomorrow was the Final Dawn, the last sunrise before the Earth and Sun are reshaped into computing elements.
There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
If you want to be reminded of the love of the Lord, just watch the sunrise.
May every sunrise hold more promise and every sunset hold more peace...
There's a sunrise and a sunset every single day, and they're absolutely free. Don't miss so many of them.

Every sunrise gives you a new beginning and a new ending. Let this morning be a new beginning to a better relationship and a new ending to the bad memories. It's an opportunity to enjoy life, breathe freely, think and love. Be grateful for this beautiful day.
